nodes.text: The D'Astan sector was a sector within the Outer Rim of the galaxy. It contained the planet Nez Peron.

The sector was ruled by the D'Asta family. By the time of Emperor Palpatine's return, it was governed by Baron Ragez D'Asta. He seceded from the Crimson Empire in 11 ABY, following the dissolution of the Interim Council. It returned to the Imperial Remnant after the Imperial Reunification in 12 ABY. As the cost of returning the sector to the Empire, Baron D'Asta required Gilad Pellaeon to consider a truce with the New Republic.
The sector was partially invaded by the Yuuzhan Vong around 27 ABY or earlier.
